hibernate-mapping.query: FROM Customer customer WHERE lower(name) = :name AND lower(code) = :code
FROM Project project WHERE project.active is true AND project.customer.active is true ORDER BY name
FROM Project project WHERE project.active is true AND project.customer.active is true AND project.defaultProject is true
FROM Project prj WHERE prj.customer IN (:customers) ORDER BY prj.name
FROM Project prj WHERE prj.customer IN (:customers) AND prj.active is true ORDER BY prj.name
FROM Project prj WHERE prj.projectManager = :user AND prj.active is true AND prj.customer.active is true
